test.name: CT003 - Criar uma chamada GET, que consulte o que foi criado no POST e validar o retorno

kw.name: Dado que eu verifico se a api esta ONLINE
Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=API, url=https://fakerestapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v1/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
